fullName: Ace Wig Salon & Luxe Shop E-Commerce Frontend
description: Complete e-commerce storefront with product browsing, cart management, checkout, and order tracking. Integrates with Convex Storefront HTTP API.

userStories.title: Product Types & Extended API Types
userStories.description: Extend types.ts with all product, variant, cart, and order interfaces matching the API documentation. Add FrontendProduct interface with variants array.

userStories.title: Cart Drawer Component
userStories.description: Create a slide-out cart drawer that shows cart items, quantities, prices, and total. Include quantity adjustment (+/-), remove item button, and checkout CTA. Match dark luxury aesthetic with gold accents.

userStories.title: Product Quick View Modal
userStories.description: Create a modal that opens when clicking a product card. Shows product image gallery, name, price, description, variant selector (if variants exist), quantity picker, and add-to-cart button.

userStories.title: Variant Selector Component
userStories.description: Create a reusable variant selector that displays variant options (size, color, style) as buttons/chips. Shows variant-specific price and stock status.

userStories.title: Quantity Picker Component
userStories.description: Create a quantity picker with +/- buttons and input field. Respects max stock limits. Includes loading state for cart updates.

userStories.title: Product Search with Instant Results
userStories.description: Upgrade the navbar search to show instant search results dropdown. Use debounced API calls. Show product thumbnails, names, prices. Click to open quick view.

userStories.title: Category Navigation Menu
userStories.description: Create a categories dropdown/sidebar that lists all product categories from API. Click to filter products by category. Show product count per category.

userStories.title: Shop Section with Filters
userStories.description: Enhance ShopSection to include price range filter, in-stock filter, and category filter. Show active filters as chips. Add 'clear filters' button.

userStories.title: Product Card Enhancement
userStories.description: Update ProductCard to open ProductQuickView modal on click. Add quick-add button for products with single variant. Show 'Out of Stock' badge when applicable.

userStories.title: Checkout Page/Modal
userStories.description: Create checkout flow with: customer info form (name, email, phone, address), cart summary, and place order button. Form validation. Success/error states.

userStories.title: Order Confirmation Component
userStories.description: Create order confirmation view showing order number, items ordered, total, and estimated delivery. Include 'Continue Shopping' and 'Track Order' buttons.

userStories.title: Checkout API Integration
userStories.description: Wire up checkout form to checkoutApi.process(). Handle loading state, success response with order ID, and error handling. Clear cart on success.

userStories.title: Order Status Lookup
userStories.description: Create 'Track Your Order' section in Contact or as modal. Form with order number and email. Displays order status, items, and timeline on success.

userStories.title: Global App State & Modal Management
userStories.description: Create AppContext for managing global state: active modals (cart, quickview, checkout, tracking), selected product, UI state. Add Modal wrapper component.

userStories.title: Toast Notifications
userStories.description: Create toast notification system for: 'Added to cart', 'Order placed', 'Error occurred'. Auto-dismiss. Stackable. Match dark luxury theme.

userStories.title: Loading Skeletons
userStories.description: Create skeleton loading components for: ProductCard, CartDrawer, CheckoutModal. Shimmer animation matching dark theme.

userStories.title: App Integration & Final Polish
userStories.description: Integrate all components into App.tsx. Ensure smooth flow: browse → quick view → add to cart → checkout → confirmation. Fix any styling inconsistencies.

userStories.title: Related Products in Quick View
userStories.description: Display related/featured products in the ProductQuickView modal. Layout: Horizontal scroll on mobile, Vertical stack on desktop side panel. Use 'useRelatedProducts' hook.

userStories.title: Mobile SideNav Search Functionality
userStories.description: Make the search text input in the mobile sidebar functional. It should behave like the main SearchBar (autocomplete/dropdown) or redirect to search results.

userStories.title: Infinite Scroll in Shop
userStories.description: Replace 'Load More' button with infinite scrolling behavior using IntersectionObserver in ShopSection. Auto-load next page when reaching bottom of grid.

userStories.title: Cart Increase-Only Logic
userStories.description: Modify CartDrawer quantity controls. Disable or remove the decrease (-) button. Users can increase quantity but cannot decrease it (must use remove button to delete).

userStories.title: Product Price Tag Styling
userStories.description: Style product price tags with a background color. Display 'Compare At' (original) price with strikethrough if available. Ensure distinct visual hierarchy.
